page.title: 15DAY IN THE LIFE OF A TEACHER
page.content: Mrs Downs lives in Oldfield Brow and works part-time as a Home Economics teacher at Loreto.She finishes work at 4.30.Her house faces south and overlooks a big garden which takes up her spare-time.Also she looks after her house and likes to cook.She loves travelling and walking.She likes this part of Oldfield Brow because all the people around know and look after things for each other.She says that the shops are conveniant,as she dosen't have to go into Altrincham, which she liked better before it grew bigger.To get to school, Mrs.Downs travels by car which takes 3 mins.She teaches both the Upper and Lower school.She lives on the edge of John Leigh park where there are Tennis Courts,Golf course,swings and slides.Oldfield Brow is good for walking.You can walk to Knutsford.
